sentences.en: Common - sense says, we lose our fortune , are sorry and weep.
sentences.cn: 常识说:我们破产了, 就愁苦啼哭.

sentences.en: Even little babes, when I take them in my arms, weep bitterly.
sentences.cn: 连小小的婴儿都一样; 我把他们抱在怀里时, 他们就使劲哭.

sentences.en: He wept bitterly (= cried a lot ) when it was time for us to leave.
sentences.cn: 我们要分别的时候他痛哭了一场。

sentences.en: Her nose twitched and she began to weep.
In severe cases, the skin can crack and weep.
sentences.cn: 在恶劣的条件下，皮肤可能会开裂并流脓。

sentences.en: Instead you hide here and weep at each other . Very peculiar. "
sentences.cn: 怎么躲在这儿相对而泣? ”
詹姆斯控制不住感情，哭了起来。

sentences.en: Laugh and the world laughs with you, weep and you weep alone.
sentences.cn: 当你笑时,整个世界同你一起欢笑, 当你哭泣时,却只有你一人独自悲哀.

sentences.en: She began to weep. That ended our discussion.
sentences.cn: 她哭了起来，我们的讨论到此结束。
她不由自主地哭了起来。

sentences.en: She wanted to laugh and weep all at once.
Sometimes he would weep half a dozen times in a single session.
sentences.cn: 有时一次拷问他要哭五、六次.

sentences.en: There are times when I sit down and have a good weep.
sentences.cn: 有时候我会坐下来痛痛快快地哭一场。
现在哭罢,以后不再哭了.

sentences.en: When Ivan heard Makar pleading, he too began to weep.
sentences.cn: 伊凡听着麦卡尔哀求, 也禁不住泪水夺眶而出.

sentences.en: Wonderfully melodic and tuneful, his songs have made me weep.
sentences.cn: 他的歌旋律优美、悦耳动听，让我潸然泪下。

words.tran_cn: 眼泪汪汪的；要哭的；催人泪下的
使人哭的小说；伤感的电影
哭泣；流泪；悲叹；流出或渗出液体

trans.tran_en: to cry, especially because you feel very sad
to cry, especially because you feel very sad
